headline: HP Inc. Names Gianluca Pettiti to Board of Directors
summary: PALO ALTO, Calif., Feb. 21, 2025 -- HP Inc. today announced the appointment of Gianluca Pettiti to its Board of Directors. Mr. Pettiti is Executive Vice President and President, Life Sciences,...
